attributes.additional_details: For too long innocent people have not only suffered the injustice in our crimal system were half or pitterfull sentences are carried out only for the person then to carry on with there lives when others were not given the chance ,but then to add more insult the rest of us have to pay around £40000 + per year per inmate to keep them .There is now no deterrent not to take a life ,look at the recent news gang killing,child and police murders even getting mugged or being a good samaritian you risk being killed rehabilitation and longer sentances do not and will not work just look at the re-offending rate.I know the arguments against - human rights ( where were the victims?),wrong person being convicted but with the scientific advances and DNA that should not happen but unfortunatly the world we live in today is an ever increasingly violent one and I think the threat of the death penalty would stop many more deaths than it would take.
